title: Hearts in talks to sell Esmael Goncalves to Uzbekistani side Pakhtakor Tashkent
description: Hearts are in talks to sell Esmael Goncalves to Pakhtakor Tashkent, a side in Uzbekistan managed by former Rangers striker Shota Arveladze.
content: It is understood no deal has been agreed by the two sides and that the 26-year-old is still in the country.Goncalves, also known as 'Isma', could be included in the squad to play away at Hamilton in the Scottish Premiership on Wednesday night.He joined from Cypriot side Anorthosis Famagusta last January but now looks as though he could leave the club just 12 months later.Goncalves has scored seven goals for Hearts in 25 appearances this season in all competitions.He has had a nomadic career - should Goncalves move to Pakhtakor they would become the tenth club he has played for in just seven years as a professional.
